body_html:
BrambleXu's suggestion / solution worked for me! Thank you very much. That was frustrating. Now, if I could only get the histogram error to go away (File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\keras\callbacks.py", line 751, in on_epoch_end
raise ValueError('If printing histograms, validation_data must be '
ValueError: If printing histograms, validation_data must be provided, and cannot be a generator.)

BrambleXu's suggestion / solution worked for me!  Thank you very much.  That was frustrating.  Now, if I could only get the histogram error to go away (File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\keras\callbacks.py", line 751, in on_epoch_end
